title: Perekani ku Orbital Temple
heading: Malizitsani Zopereka Zanu
chooseHow: Sankhani momwe mukufuna kumaliza chopereka chanu chochotsa msonkho:

option1.heading: Njira 1: Perekani Paintaneti Tsopano
option1.description: Malizitsani zopereka zanu nthawi yomweyo pogwiritsa ntchito kirediti kadi, kirediti kirediti kadi, kapena njira zina zolipirira pa intaneti kudzera mwa othandizira athu otetezeka andalama, The Field . Mulandira risiti yamisonkho pompopompo.

option2.heading: Njira 2: Bank Deposit to The Roy Foundation
option2.description: Pangani ndalama ku banki mwachindunji kapena kusamutsa waya ku The Roy Foundation , mnzathu waluso komanso wothandizira ndalama. Njira iyi ndiyabwino pazopereka zazikulu kapena kusamutsidwa kwamayiko ena.
option2.instructions: Chonde phatikizani " Orbital Temple - {donationType} " m'malo ofotokozera. Mukamaliza kusamutsa, titumizireni imelo sathi.roy@orbitaltemple.art ndi tsatanetsatane wanu kuti mulandire risiti yanu yamisonkho.

taxInfo.heading: Kupereka kwa Misonkho
taxInfo.description: Orbital Temple ndi ntchito yothandizidwa ndi ndalama ya The Field (Performance Zone Inc.) , bungwe la 501(c)(3) lopanda phindu. Zopereka zonse zaku US zimachotsedwa msonkho malinga ndi zomwe malamulo amaloledwa.
